name: Tether Tussle
description:
You play as a simplified human trying to traverse the cityscapes while avoiding enemy fire and obstacles.

This is my submission to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Controls:

F - Switch Between Grapple and Tether

Grapple Mode:

Left Click Hold - Grapple

Right Click (While Grappled) - Reel

Tether Mode:

Left Click to Tether Objects Together

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

The game's music was generated by Computoser: http://computoser.com/
